title: Solr 1.3.1 Release
description:
Please consider releasing 1.3.1 which contains just bug fixes worthwhile for a new stable release. 

For now, I'm interested in the following issues:

	SOLR-818
	Removed dependency on StAX Utils (see here for details and motivation)

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: No need to request releases via JIRA, Gunnar.  There likely will be Solr 1.3.1, no worries.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: I guess with the recent push to get 1.4 out, we can close this issue.
